overview: Wanhetang Antique Store’s annual bid-winning contest for appreciating treasures of antiques and cultural relics was vying to buy by landlords and wealthy businessmen. This year’s attendees included Gu Wanyi, a celebrity in the city, celadon at Jiedian shop, police chief Cao Bingjun, and the landlord Gao Youcai and well-known. Beijing opera Wusheng Yue Shaolou, who came to Songjiang for the first time in Shanghai, will be the best winner this year, the killer iron hook, the praying mantis catching the cicada and the oriole.
title: Iron hook
